title: KSK Mahanadi lenders may ask NCLT to speed up firm's sale process
description: On February 6, a requisite majority of KSK Mahanadi lenders passed a resolution to appeal to the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) to vacate a stay on the resolution process of the thermal power company and allow a standalone resolution of the company, the sources said.
